Package org.apache.hadoop.fs.contract

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContractOptions
    Options for contract tests: keys for FS-specific values, defaults.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBondedFSContract
    This is a filesystem contract for any class that bonds to a filesystem through the configuration.
    AbstractContractAppendTest
    Test concat -if supported
    AbstractContractConcatTest
    Test concat -if supported
    AbstractContractCreateTest
    Test creating files, overwrite options &c
    AbstractContractDeleteTest
    Test creating files, overwrite options &c
    AbstractContractMkdirTest
    Test directory operations
    AbstractContractOpenTest
    Test Seek operations
    AbstractContractRenameTest
    Test creating files, overwrite options &c
    AbstractContractRootDirectoryTest
    This class does things to the root directory.
    AbstractContractSeekTest
    Test Seek operations
    AbstractFSContract
    Class representing a filesystem contract that a filesystem implementation is expected implement.
    AbstractFSContractTestBase
    This is the base class for all the contract tests
    ContractTestUtils
    Utilities used across test cases
